Immunities.string: and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

Languages.string: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

MonsterTrait.Name: Blinding Salt Spray
MonsterTrait.Text: Any time the golem is hit in combat, thousands of tiny salt crystals erupt from its body. All creatures within 5 feet of the golem must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or become blinded for 1d3 rounds.

MonsterTrait.Name: Immutable Form
MonsterTrait.Text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The golem makes two slam attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Slam
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage and the target must make a successful DC 17 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of exhaustion.
